storyInfo: Reynell houses Team Rainbow in gratitude for their help. Meanwhile, members of the street art community are furious at Reynell's televised speech.

attributes.content: I'll take a pack of dried cactus. Auntie Marco's, por favor.
attributes.name: Community Resident

attributes.content: Auntie Marco doesn't put as much additives! It's not as good as Uncle Marco's!
attributes.name: Community Hawker

attributes.content: One pack of dried cactus. I'm starving.
attributes.name: Community Resident

attributes.content: You look like you've been up all night. Developing photos?
attributes.name: Community Hawker

attributes.content: I can't help that inspiration likes to strike in the middle of the night.
attributes.name: Community Resident

attributes.content: So when are you gonna have my photo ready?
attributes.name: Community Hawker

attributes.content: Oh, I remember now... the one you said was a gift? For the girl who's into metal music?
attributes.name: Community Resident

attributes.content: She dumped me last month...
attributes.name: Community Hawker

attributes.content: Memories like to disappear in the middle of the night, too.
attributes.name: Community Resident

attributes.content: Of all the photographers here, I had to pick the one who could never make a deadline.
attributes.name: Community Hawker

attributes.content: Back from the Galer√≠a, Tecno? How was it?
attributes.name: Community Hawker

attributes.content: Get lost.
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: What's the matter, things didn't go well? Didn't you say last night that you were going to spraypaint the whole place?
attributes.name: Community Hawker

attributes.content: What does that palace of his look like on the inside? I heard it's a large collection of works from famous artists. I should have gone with you.
attributes.name: Community Resident

attributes.content: I hardly got a doodle in before I had to run for my life.
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: Tsk, tsk.
attributes.name: Community Hawker

attributes.content: Well, you'll get another chance. And bring me along next time.
attributes.name: Community Resident

attributes.content: Me too, hehe.
attributes.name: Community Hawker

attributes.content: Enough of that, you two... where's the old man?
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: He's in a bad mood. Holed himself up in his room all day.
attributes.name: Community Resident

attributes.content: I guess he's waiting for your 'good news'.
attributes.name: Community Resident

attributes.content: So, just to confirm, you don't know Levi?
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Correct. And I should confirm that you don't know my uncle, right? Tall, wears glasses, smiles in the creepiest way you can imagine.
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: Say any more and I'll start to wonder if your uncle is the one we're looking for.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Er, I think it's just another unpleasant coincidence.
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: Now that we've resolved our misunderstandings, would you like a drink?
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: No, thank you, Mr. Reynell. We have to go.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Why are you shaking, Iana?
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: If we're not dreaming or hallucinating...
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: We've been 'shot out' by some unknown power through time or space and landed in this place...
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: A far-away planet... or Earth in some unimaginable dimension of time...
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: I'm just excited, Ela.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: I get it, but we're not just facing a strange world, we have strange problems too.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: So... stay calm, no matter how excited you feel.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: ...Sorry.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: Let's go, friends. Hopefully, we can a place to stay before nightfall.
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: Well, there's no need for doom and gloom. I'm not ungrateful for you saving my life.
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: I could at least offer a room with four walls and a roof.
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: Unless you really wanted to sleep on cardboard beneath the sky.
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: It's going to rain.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: We won't take it for free, Mr. Reynell.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: For as long as we accept your hospitality, we will protect you and ensure there won't be any other armed men charging into your room.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Or falling through the roof‚Äî
attributes.name: Mi≈Çosz

attributes.content: That will do, Mi≈Çosz. She knows what she's doing.
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: (Whisper) But we don't know anything about them, Reynell.
attributes.name: Mi≈Çosz

attributes.content: (Whisper) This is our chance to learn.
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: (Whisper) You're always so willful.
attributes.name: Mi≈Çosz

attributes.content: (Whisper) You know me.
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: If you're going to turn us down, it would be nice to do it quickly.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: No, I have no objections.
attributes.name: Mi≈Çosz

attributes.content: Let's get your employment contract drafted before HR leaves for the day.
attributes.name: Mi≈Çosz

attributes.content: Ahem. Diaz... I'm back.
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: Er, I heard you were waiting for me.
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: I... I couldn't do it. But I didn't get hurt either.
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: Sit.
attributes.name: Diaz

attributes.content: What are you watching?
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: That.
attributes.name: Diaz

attributes.content: Reynell? What is he blabbering about this time?
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: Mr. Reynell, as Galer√≠a Krysztauowa prepares for its grand opening, a local community is also planning an arts festival. What are your thought about it?
attributes.name: Voice on TV

attributes.content: I have a lot of respect for art. The people who live there have good ideas and interesting creations, but an arts festival is not something that can be organized by just anybody. They don't have any professional buy-in.
attributes.name: Voice on TV

attributes.content: It is silly to compare the two. The Galer√≠a has far more significance than their arts festival.
attributes.name: Voice on TV

attributes.content: We have gathered artwork from across the world in Dossoles, demonstrating the diversity of culture and art, while providing a platform for art lovers everywhere.
attributes.name: Voice on TV

attributes.content: The importance it poses to the development of art in Dossoles is not something that some amateur arts festival can hope to match.
attributes.name: Voice on TV

attributes.content: That peddler called us amateurs?!
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: Not the first time we've been at odds.
attributes.name: Diaz

attributes.content: All those organizations and critics have used our community as a tool to suck up to him on his first day in Dossoles.
attributes.name: Diaz

attributes.content: He talks crap about us, using our works as comparison to promote his own garbage.
attributes.name: Diaz

attributes.content: He's blocking us at every turn, from exhibitions, disc releases, even small performances.
attributes.name: Diaz

attributes.content: Remember his so-called community development project? It was a hot mess and we eventually brought it down.
attributes.name: Diaz

attributes.content: Yeah, the hate is mutual‚Äî
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: Like you. You went to tag up his Galer√≠a, didn't you?
attributes.name: Diaz

attributes.content: He was the one who hired a writer to blast my friend's work in the papers...
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: Well, since when has he ever said anything good about us? Let him‚Äî
attributes.name: Diaz

attributes.content: I have a couple of words that I want to say on behalf of all Dossoles artists.
attributes.name: Voice on TV

attributes.content: Why has Galer√≠a Krysztauowa drawn so much attention and achieved so much? It's because we represent what is truly of value in the Dossoles art scene.
attributes.name: Voice on TV

attributes.content: Absorbing the cultural nutrients of Dossoles, and representing her true spirit... that is the reason why I built Galer√≠a Krysztauowa.
attributes.name: Voice on TV

attributes.content: Who did he say he's representing?! All Dossoles artists?!
attributes.name: Diaz

attributes.content: Where was he when we put on a concert for the musicians who escaped the Singas Garden? Where was he when we were translating new Ursus novels?
attributes.name: Diaz

attributes.content: What has he ever done for art on Dossoles? How dare he claim to represent Dossoles?!
attributes.name: Diaz

attributes.content: Alright, old man, calm down, calm down...
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: Calm down?! Do you know he's opening his glass house on the same day as our arts festival?
attributes.name: Diaz

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: I didn't believe it when I heard about it this morning, but then he said it on air! It's the same day!
attributes.name: Diaz

attributes.content: What do we do, then?
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: (Deep breath)
attributes.name: Diaz

attributes.content: We do what we want. Who cares about him?
attributes.name: Diaz

attributes.content: It's more important to stay focused on taking care of our own. Don't waste your time on him.
attributes.name: Diaz

attributes.content: ...Capit√°n Mateo.
attributes.name: Commanding Officer

attributes.content: Is this everyone who made it back?
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: Go on. What happened?
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: Reynell's guards dropped down from the sky and stopped us. We lost a lot of men. I escaped with the survivors.
attributes.name: Commanding Officer

attributes.content: How many of them were there?
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: Four.
attributes.name: Commanding Officer

attributes.content: Just four?
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: Armed with guns. Very well-trained. The way they fought was unusual. We couldn't get through...
attributes.name: Commanding Officer

attributes.content: (Guns... Sankta? No mention of that in the report on Reynell... could it be Blacksteel?)
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: S-Sir, I will take full responsibility for the failure. Please don't punish anyone else.
attributes.name: Commanding Officer

attributes.content: Hmph, you're loyal to your men.
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: No need to be so jittery. That's not a bad thing.
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: Our intel was insufficient, that's all. Now we know more.
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: Take that box on your way out. There's money and casino chips in it. Share it with your men and have some fun at the casino on me.
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: C-Capit√°n? Are you sure?
attributes.name: Commanding Officer

attributes.content: Keep your ears open. Tongues are loose in a place like that.
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: Yes, sir. I'll report if I hear anything.
attributes.name: Commanding Officer

attributes.content: What about that community? The brass are pushing... It's the last piece of the puzzle for the entertainment district project.
attributes.name: Commanding Officer

attributes.content: We've just got to find a way. If Reynell won't budge, we could start with the community directly.
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: Yes, sir. I'll pay particular attention to anything about that place.
attributes.name: Commanding Officer

attributes.content: You're my first choice to manage the entertainment district once it's built. Don't disappoint me.
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: I won't!
attributes.name: Commanding Officer

attributes.content: You're here earlier than I expected. Again.
attributes.name: Mi≈Çosz

attributes.content: I don't like to make people wait.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Sorry about that. There was a bit of traffic.
attributes.name: Mi≈Çosz

attributes.content: It's nine o'clock on the dot. You're not too late.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: I used to be punctual, but then I realized that people here like to be fashionably late.
attributes.name: Mi≈Çosz

attributes.content: No problem. I got time to check out the exhibits.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: The Galeria's use of light is unique. Natural light during the day, and then bright as day again at night.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Do you like art?
attributes.name: Mi≈Çosz

attributes.content: No, just a little curious.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Feel free to take a look around during your free time. You probably won't get a chance once the Galer√≠a is officially open.
attributes.name: Mi≈Çosz

attributes.content: What? No employee tickets?
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Of course there are.
attributes.name: Mi≈Çosz

attributes.content: What I mean is you'll be able to take the time to appreciate a work you like, before the place is with crowds.
attributes.name: Mi≈Çosz

attributes.content: Sometimes it's not the crowd that affects your mood. It's a particularly creepy painting.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: You mean the one at the end of the hallway?
attributes.name: Mi≈Çosz

attributes.content: That's not a famous piece. It's a portrait of Reynell's father.
attributes.name: Mi≈Çosz

attributes.content: He was the one who left behind the legacy that allowed us to build this Galeria, far from home, and collect masterpieces from all across Terra.
attributes.name: Mi≈Çosz

attributes.content: That's why Reynell always felt it was important to do something to commemorate his father.
attributes.name: Mi≈Çosz

attributes.content: Like putting up a huge portrait here?
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Reynell wants everyone to see his father clearly. Anyway, it's just a portrait. Both Reynell and I believe Mr. Kowalski's merit goes far beyond that.
attributes.name: Mi≈Çosz

attributes.content: A faithful son, I see.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: It's almost time. I'll take you to him.
attributes.name: Mi≈Çosz

attributes.content: I've been meaning to ask, why do all visitors have to climb the stairs to get to the penthouse?
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: He prefers people expend some kind of effort to come and find him. Everyone has to take at least one flight of stairs.
attributes.name: Mi≈Çosz

attributes.content: I've never seen him do it himself.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: He has his personal elevator.
attributes.name: Mi≈Çosz

attributes.content: It's the only one in the Galer√≠a's office area, and these are the only stairs.
attributes.name: Mi≈Çosz

attributes.content: Sounds like what a genius would do, alright.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: The silver lining is that it makes security simpler. Anything else I need to know?
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: No. You have one job: Keep him alive.
attributes.name: Mi≈Çosz

attributes.content: What about at night? Do you need us to rotate shifts?
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: No, I'll be there at night.
attributes.name: Mi≈Çosz
